task.title: Sounding the horn
task.shortdesc: The horn makes a loud noise. Use the horn when required to alert pedestrians or other drivers of your presence on the road.

context.p: The horn will operate regardless of the ignition switch position.

step.cmd: Press the centre disc of the steering wheel.
Release the horn to stop the sound.
